name: License plate 101 "Forbidden road"
description: road signs ban all types of vehicles (motorized and rudimentary) traveling in both directions, except for vehicles prioritized as prescribed.

name: License plate 102 "Do not go in the opposite direction"
description: road signs prohibit all types of vehicles (motorized and rudimentary) from entering the direction of the signboard, except for priority vehicles according to regulations

name: GE
description: GE Logo identified

name: License plate 103a "Prohibition of cars"
description: road signs ban all types of motor vehicles, including 3-wheel motorcycles with passing-by boxes, except for two-wheelers, motorbikes and priority vehicles according to regulations.

name: License plate 103b "Cars are not allowed to make a right turn"
description: road signs ban all motor vehicles, including 3-wheeled motorbikes with right turn, except for two-wheeled motorbikes, mopeds and priority vehicles according to regulations.

name: Plate number 103c "Cars are prohibited from turning left"
description: road signs ban all motor vehicles, including 3-wheeled motorbikes with left turns, except motorized two-wheelers, mopeds and priority vehicles according to regulations.

name: License plate 106a "Prohibit truck"
description: road signs ban all types of freight cars with a tonnage of 1.5 tons or more, except for vehicles prioritized as prescribed. The sea has a ban effect on both tractors and special-use vehicles.

name: License plate 106b "Prohibit truck"
description: have a total weight (weight of vehicles plus goods) in excess of the prescribed number at sea.

description: road warning prohibits pedestrians

name: Plate number 113 "Prohibiting people pulling or pushing vehicles"
description: road signs prohibiting rudimentary vehicles and maneuvers pulled or pushed by them. The sea is not valid for banning baby carriages and specialized vehicles for the disabled.

name: Plate number 114 "Animal-drawn carts are prohibited"
description: sign the road prohibiting animals transporting goods or passengers whether towing or carrying on their backs.

name: License plate 115 "Vehicle weight restriction"
description: road signs ban all kinds of vehicles (motorized and rudimentary), including the vehicles prioritized according to regulations.

description: road signs ban all kinds of vehicles (motorized and rudimentary) including those prescribed by priority vehicles with total weight (both vehicles and goods).

name: Plate number 121 "Minimum distance between two vehicles"
description: Notice that cars must be at least a distance away in meters

name: License plate 122 "Stop"
description: force motorized and rudimentary vehicles, including those prioritized to stop in front of signs or at crosswalks, and only be allowed to go when seeing signals (permitted by traffic drivers or flag lights).

name: License plate 123a "Do not turn left"
description: vehicles (motorized and rudimentary) are prohibited to turn to the left at intersection positions, except for priority vehicles according to regulations. This sea also prohibits U-turns.

name: License plate 123b "Do not turn right"
description: prohibit vehicles (motorized and rudimentary) to turn to the right at intersection positions, except for priority vehicles according to regulations..

name: License plate 124a "Prohibit turning"
description: prohibit motorized and rudimentary vehicles turned around (in U-shape) except for priority vehicles as prescribed. This sign does not prohibit left turns.

name: Plate number 124b "Cars are not allowed to turn back"
description: notices prohibiting U-turn cars and 3-wheeled motorcycles (in the U-shape), except for priority vehicles as prescribed. This sign does not prohibit left turns.

name: License plate 125 "Prohibit overtaking"
description: Motor vehicles are banned from overtaking each other, including priority vehicles according to regulations.

name: License plate 126 "Prohibit cars; overloading"
description: Ban all types of trucks passing other motor vehicles. Ban all types of trucks of the maximum weight allowed (including vehicle and cargo weight) above 3.5 tons, including vehicles prioritized under other motorized overtaking regulations..

name: Number plate 129 "Check"

name: License plate 130 "Parking and parking are prohibited"
description: indicate where parking is prohibited and park. The sea has the effect of banning motor vehicles that stop and park on the side of the road where signs are posted, except for vehicles prioritized as prescribed.

name: License plate 131c "No parking"
